findings.title: No bounty function is present
findings.description: Tokens are reserved for bounty but there is no corresponding function to utilize them, resulting in token wastage.

findings.title: Hardcap and softcap mismatch
findings.description: Hardcap and softcap are defined in terms of dollars in description but taken in ether in smart contracts without any conversion mechanism.

findings.title: Token Supply Not Multiplied by 10¹⁸
findings.description: The token supply and other token pools are not multiplied by 10¹⁸, which is a standard decimal precision for tokens. This may cause issues with wallet integrations.

findings.title: Unchecked constructor arguments
findings.description: Constructor arguments are not checked or validated before being used in the contract.

findings.title: Lack of ether to USD conversion
findings.description: Hardcap and softcap are defined in terms of dollars in description but taken in ether in smart contracts without any conversion mechanism.

findings.title: Poor contract structure
findings.description: The contract has issues with token definitions and conversions, including a lack of ether to dollar conversion mechanism, incorrect token pool definitions, and inconsistent investment price units.
